title: Riverview Landscapes Expands into Connecticut with Acquisition of All State Landscape Services
description: NEW BRITAIN, Conn., August 07, 2025--Riverview Landscapes Expands into Connecticut with Acquisition of All State Landscape Services
content:
NEW BRITAIN, Conn., August 07, 2025--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Riverview Landscapes ("Riverview") today announced it has completed the acquisition of All State Landscape Services LLC, a leading provider of commercial landscaping and snow services based in New Britain, CT. The acquisition marks Riverview’s first expansion into Connecticut and its 16th acquisition since 2022.

Founded by Peter Niro III and his father in 2013, All State Landscape Services has built a strong reputation throughout Connecticut for delivering high-quality landscape solutions to a loyal commercial client base. Peter will remain involved in a consulting role, while longtime All State general manager Mark Kozon will assume responsibility as Branch Manager of Riverview’s Greater Hartford branch.

"We’ve been looking to enter the Connecticut market with the right partner, and All State stood out immediately," said Michael Waterman, CEO of Riverview Landscapes. "Peter and Mark have built a great business known for its exceptional team and client service, and we’re excited to support their team and customers as we expand in the region."

"The Riverview team understood the heart of our business from day one," said Peter Niro III. "Their commitment to people, long-term growth, and service aligned perfectly with our values. I’m proud to be joining forces and confident Mark will successfully lead the next chapter of growth."

"I’ve spent my career in this business with the Niro family, and I’m incredibly proud of where we are today," said Mark Kozon. "This is a storybook union of two companies that align with the same mission and objectives. Our customers will always be our number one priority. Joining Riverview gives us additional resources and support to continue serving our customers and growing our presence throughout Connecticut. My entire team and I are very excited for what’s ahead."

Mark has been with All State since its founding 12 years ago and has worked alongside the Niro family since 1991, beginning his career under Peter’s father and ultimately building All State into what it is today.

About Riverview Landscapes

Riverview Landscapes provides landscaping and snow services to thousands of customers throughout New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, Pennsylvania and Massachusetts with over 500 employees. Riverview has completed 16 acquisitions since its founding in 2022 and is owned by Talus Holdings and management. For more information, please visit www.riverviewco.com.
